nodes.text: Zirulast was a white dwarf star located in the Zirulast system, a part of the Belasco sector in the Slice portion of the Expansion Region. The star was situated on the Ootmian Pabol hyperlane, which connected it to the Belasco system as well as the New Apsolon system in the Mid Rim. Zirulast was orbited by a terrestrial planet of the same name. The latter was home to the sentient Temolak species.

The star Zirulast was created for Ultimate Alien Anthology, a 2003 Wizards of the Coast sourcebook for use with the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Zirulast system, and therefore the star itself, in grid square P-11.
